verbose_text: Interestingly, PPF was not readily observed in APPPS1 mice (PPF ratio = 1.07 with an inter-stimulus interval of 50 ms), thus PPF was strongly decreased relative to WT (PPF ratio = 1.39, inter-stimulus interval of 50 ms) and APPPS1xP2X7Rko (PPF ratio = 1.32, inter-stimulus interval of 50 ms, P < = 0.001; Fig. XREF_FIG) mice.
evidence: PPF was strongly decreased relative to WT
